name: Marcelo Magallon
bio: I have been programming in Go for several years both professionally and for hobby projects. I've come to love the simplicity and expressiveness of the language, as well as the wonderful community of people that has grown around it.

name: Michael Hedgpeth
bio: I love teaching people how to learn new things and am learning Go myself, so I'd like to give back

name: Pongpanot Chuaysakun
bio: I'm a junior developer from Thailnad. I want learn a new technology for improve myself.

name: Magnus Lassi
bio: I've been programming in many languages both professionally and as a hobby. I really like Go for its simplicity.
